Package com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.multi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MultiServiceEventClient.UninstallCallback
    Interface for notifying the caller that an added service has completed uninstalling and has been removed.
    ServiceFactory
    Callback object which constructs (or reconstructs) a service based on its name/id and context data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MultiServiceEventClient
    An implementation of MesosEventClient which wraps multiple running services, routing Mesos events to each client appropriately.
    MultiServiceManager
    Handles adding/removing active services in a multi-service scheduler, and functions as the central source of truth for running services, including services which are in the process of uninstalling.
    MultiServiceRunner
    Sets up and executes a FrameworkRunner to which potentially multiple AbstractSchedulers may be added.
    MultiServiceRunner.Builder
    Builder for MultiServiceRunner.
    ServiceStore
    Default implementation of persistent storage which keeps track of the services that have been added to a dynamic multi-scheduler.
